Section.Catchline: Withdrawal of authorization as service company.

SectionBody.Text: The failure to comply with any provision of ss. 626.895-626.899 or with any rule or any order of the commission or office within the time prescribed shall be considered good cause for withdrawal of the certificate of approval. The office shall by registered or certified mail give to the service company prior written notice of such withdrawal. The service company shall have 30 days from the date of mailing to request a hearing. The failure to request a hearing within the time prescribed shall result in the withdrawal becoming effective 45 days from the date of mailing of the original notice. In no event shall the withdrawal of the certificate of approval be effective prior to the date upon which a hearing, if requested, is scheduled. Copies of such notice of withdrawal of a certificate of approval shall be furnished by the office to each self-funded program serviced.
